Text: This frame has yet to receive its final calibrations.
Even if you re-read the data afterwards, you would only experience it as the actions of another, not your own.
That is to say, after this battle...
...I will no longer be myself.
This frame has yet to receive its final calibrations.
Even if you re-read the data afterwards, you would only experience it as the actions of another, not your own.
That is to say, after this battle...
...I will no longer be myself.
This frame has yet to receive its final calibrations.
Even if you re-read the data afterwards, you would only experience it as the actions of another, not your own.
That is to say, after this battle...
...I will no longer be myself.
You would go to such lengths? Then I'll give you my all.
You will never hurt... Commandant!
I still... remember...
The times we all spent together... The awakening machines, and the infected Tifa.
I feel grave sadness for them... But there was nothing I can do, but to defeat them.
Are you trying to take me with you?!
If this is the only way!
Commandant, please allow me...!
I still remember... the sister who took care of me, and Camu who appeared after Kamui's corruption.
They dread this world because of the madness the virus brings.
So I told them what I learnt from Commandant.
You can't survive alone.
No matter how this battle ends, "you" will fade from this world, "you" will no longer exist——
Is not ending it here the best possible outcome?
I won't fade.
No matter what happens, I will always, always be with you, Commandant!
<color=#000000>Commandant—</color>
I wanted to escort the commandant out of here.
But it looks like... I...
It matters not if the merging halts!
I'll destroy the ARU. I'll get to live!
...Ugh!
Looks like that commandant is having some trouble in my M.I.N.D., ahahahaha!
End your pointless struggle. Then die!
I won't give up...!
Cough... Don't think I won't retaliate!
How, she's...!
But if I follow what Commandant says...
There!
...Ugh!
Ngh... It's too late!
Let's end it here!
FALL!
This is... within my striking range!
Stop that narwhal's wails! Stop!
It's not... OVER!!!
...Commandant, let's end this nightmare.

...Thanks.
I would like to think that... I made this decision myself.
Even if you refuse, I must end myself here.
Because I'm... Kowloong City's...
Even if I have to resort to violence...
I must keep you here...
I am the Alpha and the Omega. I am the arbiter. I am everything.
I am the cunning fox. I am the dreadful lion.
I buried Father. I built his kingdom.\nI released blood and the beasts sealed in Heaven. I crowned the champion.
To bring Father back to Earth, I crown the champion.
However, there is no champion here.
There was no champion last time, or the time before.
Every time, I destroy Father's city and rebuild it again.
Every time, I release blood and the beasts sealed in Heaven. I crown the champion.
It hurts! It hurts! It huuuurts!
Hehe... hehehe... You poor things, do you think that is it?!
I will crush you all!
Sink... till the bottom of this sea.
Everything crumbles and falls...
I... I can no longer go back!
Let the ocean bury you!
They will seek, understand,
and possess sentiments once only known to humankind.
They will learn, abolish,
and replace humanity's dated ideas of the world.

The will of the Punishing Virus has corrupted the Signal Orbs?!
Torrent<//FUSION>…… Hope <//DESPAIR>…
It's using the contaminated Signal Orbs as its power! Leave, Lucia!
Garghhh—!
Lucia!
Embrace <//REJECTION>... Annihilate <//REBIRTH>...
The Punishing Virus is gathering. At this rate...
I can... stop it...!
I entrust the hope to you, Lucia...
Give Liv back to us!
If only we could have peace soon, that'd be nice.
Then we could go on a trip together.
I will never change my decision no matter what.
I'll be by your side. That is our promise.
Will you hold my hand?
That is the most precious gift that I wish to have.
I am Lucia, and you're my commandant. That's all I need.
Let's walk forth together, Commandant.
Everything that we've been through becomes our memories and stays in our M.I.N.D.
I seem to start taking a liking of...
...If it's possible, I'd like to get mentally prepared for it...
So you are the commandant, huh... Just don't do anything stupid.
You don't have to cotton up to me.
...What are you looking at?
Are you available? How about we have a friendly contest?
I seem to have gotten used to you.
It just happened to be my shift today. I wasn't here waiting for you to return.
If you are in trouble, make sure to tell me. Don't carry all the heavy burdens by yourself.
I'm glad you are willing to learn more about me too...
Commandant... I'm Liv... I'm here to help.
Good morning, Commandant. Make sure not to miss a meal., Otherwise, your blood sugar level will drop.
Commandant, could you tell me more about... yourself?
I have been of use lately, am I not? I've been hard at work training my combat skills.
I'm glad to be so close to you, Commandant.
Meeting you is the best thing that has happened to me.
Huh? Are you scared of the dark? Well... I guess I'll keep you company for a little longer, then!
If it is possible, I hope I'll get to watch the sun rise and set with you sometime.
I have received more than enough precious gifts that I can treat as "memories."
Now it's my turn...
Now it's my turn to give everyone a "future" in return…
Random Portrait Switch
I'm Lucia, the captain of Gray Raven.
I'm Liv, from Gray Raven.
This is the climax!
I'm ready!
I don't know why I'm here either.
This poster is from a long time ago.
It seems to depict a character in a game.
For some reason, its colors have not faded over time.
The trash can is empty.
In a corner set off by the warm light...
The tables and chairs are scattered on the floor.
It's like people have just left after partying.
Warning... Leave...
All the Corrupted look like Constructs from Babylonia... What happened to them?
It seems to be a part that fell off from a big guy... This part is still salvageable.
Leads... to a brighter future...
Nanami wishes so too.
This is the ruin of a relay station.
Some signal units are still working.
Mothers... I discovered 3 more Mothers... T-they are all hatching already!
Get out of there! Retreat! Retreat!!!
The eastern front has fallen... The biological signals were a trick from the Hetero-Creatures... It's a trap...
Muffled screams come from the messy radio channel.
The apocalypse has manifested through countless pale human figures with the smell of blood and the Red Tide in the air.
—There is no longer a place that is safe on this planet.
Nanami once thought Babylonia would always stay somewhere in the sky, and Nanami's friends there would always watch over Nanami.
...But perhaps it is not inevitable.
The white bird stops before the destination that leads to a calamity.
The fire that once burnt up despair...
...Is turning into despair itself in the ashes.
Let's go!
Female Construct：Gargh... They just keep coming.
Female Construct：Let me check the frame damage... Tsk, it needs some work done... Rookie, can you go ahead first? I'll be there soon.
Construct Soldier：Roger that!
Female Construct：...Ah! Dammit, how can I miss that...? Rookie! Rookie! Do you copy?! Dammit, the comms device is down.
Female Construct：...I have to turn on the radar now.
Female Construct：Gasp, I need to do my part too. Gotta keep the rookie alive.
Female Construct：Leave the rest to Uncle to decide. He'll figure it out.
Construct Soldier：Gasp... I found a way. I must contact her... now...
Construct Soldier：Hello? Hello? Do you copy? Why do I see radar signals over there?
Construct Soldier：Dammit... Is her device broken? I must be faster than her! Right, the signal tower! I'm sure the signals will be stronger and wider there!
Construct Soldier：Gargh... Ahhhhh...
Construct Soldier：Gargh, finally here... My voice module can't last any longer. I must turn on the signal tower to talk to her...
Construct Soldier：Signal tower... To broadcast the signals...
Construct Captain：Incoming comms? What is this...?
Construct Captain：Report your situation! What's going on? Why do I see your signal on the signal tower?!
Construct Captain：Is your voice module broken? I can't read the message. The image quality is too poor. Just move away from the tower. There are lots of... over there...
Construct Captain：What? I have to turn on the radar from remote? No...
Construct Captain：I found the corrupted device... Dammit... It's so close.
Construct Captain：Sigh... I wish you a sweet dream... on this summer night.
Arrgh…
And by a sleep to say we end the heart-ache and the thousand natural shocks that flesh is heir to…
'Tis a consummation devoutly to be wish'd.
Whether 'tis nobler in the mind to suffer the slings and arrows of outrageous fortune, or to take arms against a sea of troubles, and by opposing end them?
To be, or not to be, that is the question.
All the world's a stage, and all the men and women merely players.
'Tis now the very witching time of night, when churchyards yawn, and hell itself breathes out contagion to this world.
The rest is silence.
REBOOTED
RADAR SENSOR MALFUNCTIONING
VISUAL MODULE MALFUNCTIONING
TACTICAL CIRCUIT INITIATING
CORRUPTED MEMORY DATA DETECTED
Detected multiple bullet holes and human DNA.
The gate was locked from the inside.
Human blood and generic vital fluid are detected in the stain. Based on the amount, it doesn't appear to be fatal, and the trail seems to be traceable.
A rickety defensive facility. A large amount of vital fluid can be detected on the ground.
Even more Corrupted are here.
It looks like the graffiti before... Are they connected?
Intel gathered
Start deducing
Corrupted entered from here
It appears to be barricaded from the inside to prevent Corrupted from entering.
Analyzing composition of residual substances... Human trajectory confirmed.
A mechanoid was defending against Corrupted here.
Obstruction failed, but it bought the human enough time to evacuate.
The human evacuated from here.
This graffiti... only appeared after this occurrence.
Warning! Warning!
The base has been breached! Everybody on guard!
Attempting to identify the invader... An Ascendant?!
Warning! Warning!
Abnormal Punishing Virus concentration detected.
Activating emergency plan. All personnel are to report to their positions immediately.
System: Protocol 343 in effect. The area remains sealed.
System: Please wait for the engineers to report the problem and cancel the protocol.
System: Activating Minos Cabin Gravity System.
System: System activated.
System: To optimize space utilization through deployment and operation.
System: Generating building structure graphics.
System: System demonstration activated.
System: Minos Cabin Gravity System uses artificial gravity
System: To optimize space utilization through deployment and operation.
System: This is the end of the demonstration.
System: Turning off the demonstration.
System: Activate Minos Cabin Gravity System.
System: Warning! Anomaly detected in the cabin!
System: Emergency isolation activated. Running continuous self-check.
Warning! Unauthorized armed unit detected in cabin 4. Security system activated.
System: All cabins authenticated. Allow use of the aisle cabin.
System: Deploying cabins...
I have long given up everything as a human the moment I became an Ascendant... except the indelible hate and pain.
But actually this is another thing that I can't forget—your birthday. It's the proof of your birth, and I'll always remember it.
Your birth made me your "sister," which is lucky for me.
Thank you for coming to this world, Luna.
Now, it's the time for backstabbing.
Robert—!
